author: elseifhatsumi
install_msg: Thank you for installing still. support. To load it, type `[p]load stillsupport`. Then use `[p]help StillSupport` for instructions.
name: stillsupport
short: Let members open tickets by reacting to a message.
description: Let members open tickets by reacting to a message. The tickets are private channels on the member and staff have access to.
